titleStmt.title: The speech of Their Excellencies the Lords Ambassadours Extraordinary. From the high and mighty States General of the United Provinces of the Netherlands, taking their leave of both the Honourable Houses of Parliament assembled at Westminster. 10. April 1645. Translated out of French into English: and printed by their Excellencies order. Steph. Taylor secr. Together with a moderate answer by a private gentleman. Printed according to order.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.B. for Robert Bostock, at the Kings head in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Henry Parker Esq".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings head in Pauls Church-yard.
